Fati Abubakar bụ onye Naijiria na- agbasa ozi site na foto na idekọ  kwa foto
A mụrụ Abubakar ma zụlite kwa ya na Maiduguri, nke Nigeria
Ebipụtala ọrụ ya na New York Times, CNN Afrịka BBC na Voice of America
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ n'ụzọ bụ isi n'ịdekọ ihe ọjọọ dị na Borno, gụnyere ọgụ Boko Haram
O nwere oru ngo a na-akpo Bits of Borno
